name: easy one click comment disable on Post
author: ifourtechnolab

sections.description: Disable enable on Comment Help you to create dynamic disable enable for user website.
sections.installation:
1. Download plugin and unzip it to your /wp-content/plugins/ plugin directory.
  2. After that go to your plug-in manager and activate it.
  3. After activate easy clickable comment on post Go to post menu and disable enable Comment.
sections.faq:
1. It is free ?
    Yes.- Current currency status is totaly free and there is no extra charges for used this plugin
  2. It is Configurable ?
    Yes.- Current currency status is configurable from admin.

Installation Instructions

  1. Download plugin and unzip it to your /wp-content/plugins/ plugin directory.
  2. After that go to your plug-in manager and activate it.
  3. After activate easy clickable comment on post Go to post menu and disable enable Comment.
